name: Ballcraft
description:
Windows: Download ballcraft.exe and ballcraft.pck.
Linux: Download ballcraft.x86_64 and ballcraft.pck.
Web: Doesn't run for some reason.

I wanted to make a game in one week. I got the idea for a breakout adventure game, and it morphed into a roguelike. Inspired by Dungeon Crawl: Stone Soup.

I haven't worked on it since January, so I figured I might as well release it to see if someone likes it.

Likely very buggy, and not balanced at all.

Tell me if you think it's a good idea and I might work on it some more.
